para: This option selects the destination type of this filter to be routes. Choose this when you want to convert tracks into waypoints routes. A single route will be created in the sequence they appear in the input.

info.title: Converting a pile of waypoints to a GPX route

example.para: Say you you have a data file that came from CSV file that you want to convert to a GPX route that can be loaded into Basecamp. Use the following command:

para.userinput: gpsbabel -i csv -f blah.txt -x transform,rte=wpt -o gdb -F blah.gdb
